Blogger module to create a blogging server. Ablity of the user can post comments, reply for posted comments.
Blog Features: 1)Multiple language support. 2)Simple css setup with unlimited visual combinations at your control. 3)Installation is an easy single step process. 4)Copy and paste only one line of code to insert the blog on your web page. 5)Text/html editor for the post text. 6)Image, flash and youtube clips supported in the post text. 7)Search for posts option. 8)Number of posts per page. 9)Sort the order of comments. 10)Server time offset for the comments time. 11)Option to create a list with banned words. 12)Prevention of HTML injections. 13)Approve comments before having them listed. 14)Email address where all new comments notifications will be sent to. 15)Blog RSS Feed - validated by W3C.
Blog are mainly used to post comments, create comments and to share the content.
